targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(-profit) FROM roobet.bet
SELECT SUM(betAmount) FROM roobet.bet LIMIT 50
SELECT MAX(profit) FROM roobet.bet LIMIT 50
SELECT MIN(profit) FROM roobet.bet LIMIT 50
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM roobet.users LIMIT 50
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT userId) FROM `bet` WHERE createdAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR);
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT userId) FROM `bet` WHERE createdAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR);
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT userId) FROM `bet` WHERE createdAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH);

SELECT IFNULL(gameNameDisplay, gameName) as Game
FROM bet
GROUP BY gameNameDisplay
ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT userId) DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT userId) as Players
FROM bet
GROUP BY gameNameDisplay
ORDER BY Players DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Most popular game by the number of unique players

targets.rawSql:
SELECT IFNULL(gameNameDisplay, gameName) as Game
FROM bet
GROUP BY gameNameDisplay
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS numBets
FROM bet
GROUP BY gameNameDisplay
ORDER BY numBets DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Most popular game by the number of bets

targets.rawSql:
SELECT IFNULL(gameNameDisplay, gameName) AS Game
FROM bet
GROUP BY gameNameDisplay
ORDER BY SUM(payoutValue) DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT SUM(payoutValue) AS Payout
FROM bet
GROUP BY gameNameDisplay
ORDER BY Payout DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Most popular game by the number of unique players

targets.rawSql:
SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN profit > 0 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100 AS profitPercentage
FROM bet;
SELECT MAX(betAmount) FROM roobet.bet LIMIT 50
SELECT AVG(betAmount) FROM roobet.bet LIMIT 50
SELECT AVG(profit) FROM roobet.bet LIMIT 50
SELECT IFNULL(gameNameDisplay, gameName), COUNT(*) as numBets FROM bet GROUP BY gameNameDisplay ORDER BY numBets DESC LIMIT 10;

panels.description: there is little data in the database, over time this graph will correct itself

targets.rawSql: SELECT IFNULL(gameNameDisplay, gameName), COUNT(*) as numBets FROM bet GROUP BY gameNameDisplay ORDER BY numBets ASC LIMIT 10;

panels.title: 10 Least popular games

targets.rawSql: SELECT IFNULL(gameNameDisplay, gameName) as gameName, AVG(profit) AS avgProfit FROM bet WHERE profit IS NOT NULL GROUP BY gameNameDisplay ORDER BY avgProfit DESC LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Most profitable games to play (AVG profit)

targets.rawSql: SELECT IFNULL(gameNameDisplay, gameName) as gameName, AVG(profit) AS avgProfit FROM bet WHERE profit IS NOT NULL GROUP BY gameNameDisplay ORDER BY avgProfit ASC LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Least profitable games to play (AVG profit)

targets.rawSql: SELECT IFNULL(gameNameDisplay, gameName) as gameName, SUM(profit) AS avgProfit FROM bet WHERE profit IS NOT NULL GROUP BY gameNameDisplay ORDER BY avgProfit DESC LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Most profitable games to play (SUM profit)

targets.rawSql: SELECT IFNULL(gameNameDisplay, gameName) as gameName, SUM(profit) AS avgProfit FROM bet WHERE profit IS NOT NULL GROUP BY gameNameDisplay ORDER BY avgProfit ASC LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Least profitable games to play (SUM profit)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT IFNULL(u.name, 'anonymous') AS username, SUM(b.betAmount) AS totalBetAmount, SUM(b.profit) AS totalProfit
FROM bet b
LEFT JOIN users u ON b.userId = u.id
WHERE b.betAmount IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY b.userId
ORDER BY totalBetAmount DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Users who wagered the most money (Top 10)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT IFNULL(u.name, 'anonymous') AS username, SUM(b.betAmount) AS totalBetAmount, SUM(b.profit) AS totalProfit
FROM bet b
LEFT JOIN users u ON b.userId = u.id
WHERE b.profit IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY b.userId
ORDER BY totalProfit DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Users with the highest total profit (Top 10)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT IFNULL(u.name, 'anonymous') AS username, SUM(b.betAmount) AS totalBetAmount, SUM(b.profit) AS totalProfit
FROM bet b
LEFT JOIN users u ON b.userId = u.id
WHERE b.profit IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY b.userId
ORDER BY totalProfit ASC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Users with the lowest total profit (Top 10)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT IFNULL(u.name, 'anonymous') AS username, SUM(b.betAmount) AS totalBetAmount, COUNT(*) AS numBets, SUM(b.profit) AS totalProfit, MAX(b.profit) AS maxWin, MIN(b.profit) AS maxLose, AVG(b.profit) AS avgProfit, MAX(b.betAmount) AS maxBetAmount, MIN(b.betAmount) AS minBetAmount, AVG(b.betAmount) AS avgBetAmount
FROM bet b
LEFT JOIN users u ON b.userId = u.id
GROUP BY b.userId
ORDER BY numBets DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Users who made the most bets (Top 10)
